name: It's Fishing Time
description:
Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around. Click on the fish to catch them and gain points. (There is currently no way to lose lol, enjoy)

This is my first ever game made on Unity! I simply just looked up tutorials whenever I wanted to add a feature, I know it's pretty bad and you can't even lose but I still had a fun time making it and I want to make more in the future. The volume slider doesn't actually work because there is no sound and the graphics are pretty bad, I don't know if I will work on this in the future. Probably not because I was just making it for practice and to learn and I already have ideas for other projects. Let me know what you think, if they're any bugs, and what I could improve on, thanks!
